title: NeuroSwarm Governance Overview
content:
What is NeuroSwarm Governance?

NeuroSwarm implements a sophisticated governance system that combines badge-weighted voting with transparent decision-making processes. Our governance model ensures that contributors with proven track records have greater influence in shaping the platform's future.

Key Components

  • Badge System: Contributors earn badges through active participation and demonstrated expertise
  • Proposal Lifecycle: Structured process from draft to implementation
  • Transparent Voting: All votes are recorded on-chain with complete audit trails
  • Working Groups: Specialized teams focused on different aspects of platform development

Getting Started with Governance

To participate in NeuroSwarm governance, you'll need to:

  1. Complete contributor onboarding
  2. Earn your first badge through contributions
  3. Connect a Solana-compatible wallet
  4. Start voting on active proposals
